name: 1v1 obesity
description:
i made this game in 10 hours for a competition with a friend 

how to play:

you can catch foods, some are good, some are bad

if you get too fat you will explode

and you can throw foods at your friend to make him fat

commands:

player 1: W A S D to move, ENTER to throw foods and RIGHT SHIFT to eat;

player 2: ARROWS to move, C to throw foods and V to eat
